## Security

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability in this project, please report it responsibly.

### Reporting a vulnerability

- **Do not open a public issue** for security-related reports.
- Instead, contact the project maintainer(s) directly using the contact information available on the repository ownerâ€™s GitHub profile.
- Include as much detail as possible to help reproduce and assess the issue (affected versions, impact, reproduction steps, etc.).

The maintainer(s) will review the report and respond as soon as reasonably possible.

---

## Getting help (non-security)

If you need help using this project or have general questions:

- Search existing issues for similar questions
- Open a new issue titled `Support: <short description>` describing your question
- Include relevant environment details and expected vs. actual behavior

If GitHub Discussions are enabled for this repository, you may also ask questions there.
